title.narrative: Programa Suplementario para la Infraestructura Vial para la Competitividad
Suplementary Road Infrastructure for Competitiveness Program

description.narrative: El Objetivo del Programa es el incrementar los recursos de financiamiento del Banco para los préstamos 1530/SF-NI, 1599/SF-NI y 1796/SF-NI, a fin de que puedan realizarce las obras incluidas en cada uno de ellos y se pueda así alcanzar sus objetivos de desarrollo. Además se llevara a cabo el adoquinado de la carretera Juigalpa-La Libertad.

The general objective of the program is to continue to support execution of the works designed to improve traffic and safety conditions on the national road system, thereby helping to better integrate the regions involved and thus contributing to Nicaragua¿s sustainable economic and social development. Specifically, it will provide additional financing to complete civil works involving road rehabilitation, widening, and paving under loans 1530/SF-NI, 1599/SF-NI, and 1796/SF-NI, while preserving the goal and purpose of these programs. In addition, the productive road rehabilitation targets under loan 1599/SF-NI will be increased.
